structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The county surveyor shall append to the field notes of every survey the date of the survey and the variations of the needle from the true meridian at the time of making the survey.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4676.
